subtasks: Lower the box with attached equipment onto the truck bed
Secure equipment to the truck bed
Close the truck bed gate
Straighten the trailer hitch
Align the trailer with the towing vehicle
Open the trailer ramp
Remove heavy equipment from the trailer
Close the trailer doors
Drive the tractor along the furrows
Monitor crops from the tractor seat
Engage the rear wheels for steering
Release the seed bag from the planter
Dispose of empty seed bag

tasks.task: Prepare to drive on public roads
subtasks: Remove safety equipment from the tractor
Retrieve protective gear from the equipment
Adjust the trailer's side mirrors
Confirm visibility of the towing vehicle's mirrors
Tighten the ball hitch pin
Check for proper coupling alignment
Lock the safety chains
Connect the coupling latches
Release the safety brakes on the trailer
Lift the trailer separable hitch
Slide the ball pin of the tractor's drawbar
Unlock the coupler on the tractor
Space the mounting brackets to secure the trailer
Move the tractor away from the crop rows
Tilt the steering wheel to parallel park the tractor
Open the trailer's safety latch
Unfasten the coupler lock on the tractor
Check the required driving permits for the vehicle
